message: I will be uploading info later on through thepiratebay.org. If you don't know how to work torrents hit me up it is really simple. Modern day guerrillas need to be up to date with communications technology so if by some chance you are technologically inept i can give you some advice on the basics. It is imperative that each guerrilla squad be able to operate independently without need for orders or assistance from other squads. Our initial disorganization is one of our greater cards, along with speed and the power of the people.

Simple Topic for new PFH Guerrillas. No Names. No Personal Info. You come here to get your basic low down on how guerrilla operations work. You learn basic skills and tactics here to organize your own groups. Every guerrilla MUST be fully trained for success to be possible.
